title: My username and password arent working
body: So i have been waiting for a reply back from riot for almost 7 hours. I cant access my email i used to create the account but have a different one they can use. I dont know why its not working when i logged in like last week and everything was fine. This account im using now is my new one.

replies.body: I'd like to look into your ticket's status!  Did you do it through an [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account)?  What's your ticket number?
I'm having the same issue. I haven't been able to login for over a month now and my account is decaying :(
